description: This file defines the MainActivity class of an Android application written in Kotlin. It initializes the activity, sets up data binding, and observes several flows from its ViewModel to update the UI with expense tracking data such as month label, balance, income, and expenses.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: An Android activity that initializes UI components, sets up observers on ViewModel's StateFlow properties, and updates the UI with expense tracker data.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Entry point of the activity. Inflates layout, sets the activity title, and initializes observers for UI updates.

methods.name: setupObservers
methods.description: Sets up coroutine-based observers on the ViewModel's StateFlow properties to update the UI elements dynamically.
